ygData.subject: NPE in QuotaEnforcer.checkQuotas()
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all. Our harvesting depends on the QuotaEnforcer. However, the QuotaEnforcer in 1.10.1 (v. 1.7) generate a NullPointerException, whenever bad URI is given

Subject: NPE in QuotaEnforcer.checkQuotas()

Dear all.

Our harvesting depends on the QuotaEnforcer.
However, the QuotaE=
nforcer in 1.10.1 (v. 1.7) generate a NullPointerException, whenever
bad UR=
I is given to the checkQuotas() method. 

This causes a lot of noise in the=
 logs.

I rapported bug 1593540 some time ago: 
https://sourceforge.net/tra=
cker/?func=3Ddetail&atid=3D539099&aid=3D1593540&group_id=3D73833

The lates=
t QuotaEnforcer still have this problem.

I would very much like this to be=
 fixed in the next version of Heritrix.

Regards
--------------------------=
-------------------------------------------------
S=F8ren Vejrup Carlsen, D=
epartment of Digital Preservation, Royal Library, Copenhagen, Denmark
